mapper.insert: insert into tb_order_item (id, item_id, goods_id, order_id, title, price, num, total_fee, pic_path, seller_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_order_item set item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, item_id, goods_id, order_id, title, price, num, total_fee, pic_path, seller_id from tb_order_item
